constraints.name: adjacent_equality
constraints.description: 相邻元素相等的情况出现次数不超过 k
constraints.formal: count(i: 1 <= i < m, b[i] == b[i+1]) <= k

constraints.name: prefix_gcd_constraint
constraints.description: 序列 b 是序列 a 的前缀 gcd 序列，即 b[i] = gcd(a[1], a[2], ..., a[i])

constraints.name: distinct_subsequences
constraints.description: 计算不同的 b 序列的个数

result.description: 统计满足特定条件的不同序列的个数

result.name: optimal_substructure
result.description: 最优子结构：大问题的解由子问题的解组合而成，通过动态规划求解不同b序列的个数
